info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:24AM CDT until July 06 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southern Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 324 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Morse to 3 miles northeast of Wolf Creek Park to 5 miles north of Follett, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 315 AM CDT, a 60 mph wind gust was recorded at the Perryton airport. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Borger, Perryton, Spearman, Lipscomb, Canadian, Miami, Fritch, Stinnett, Booker, Gruver, Follett, Higgins, Darrouzett, Sanford, Wolf Creek Park, Farnsworth, Waka, Glazier, Lake Marvin and Pringle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
